p: We select one county in each region to show results of wavelet analysis. In Huangzhong of Qinghai, both local ( Fig 2B) and global ( Fig 2C) powers are the largest at the period of 1 year, suggesting that HFMD cases show a major annual periodicity (i.e., the continuous red region at period of one year in both maps). However, the local maximum power value at the period of 1 and 0.5 years in Fig 2F and Fig 2G suggests that HFMD cases in Fengxian show a major epidemic of annual periodicity combined with an intermittent semi-annual cycle. The reconstructed curves ( Fig 2D and 2H), which show a satisfactory overall agreement with the raw data, confirm the correctness of the identified major epidemic period. Results for all other counties ( S1 Fig) indicate that there are only 11 counties showing persistent major annual epidemics in Qinghai during the study period while the rest showing sporadic outbreaks, and all counties in Shanghai ( S2 Fig) show persistent major annual epidemics.
